attributes.action: Scrutinise the methods used by denbighshire county council  in  providing Faith school  in North of the county
attributes.additional_details:
There is concern and anxiety  about the methods used by Denbighshire County Council   in its plans  and consultation  on provision  and re-organisation  for Faith Schools  in the North of the County.

There is a suspicion  and a concern  that  the school  currently   located in Denbigh  will  be closed.

Please  look very very closely  at the  methodolgy  and the  methods  utilised by the county  during the consultation process.
